document_data.mainbody: '''Deep Sashelas''' ({{Pronounce|deep|_|SÆSH|ul|us|refs=<ref>{{Cite dragon/93/Ay pronunseeAYshun gyd|26}}}}) was an [[Seldarine|elven deity]] who made his home on [[Arvandor]], although he was rumored to maintain a demesne off the coast of the [[Moonshae Isles]] known as [[Tír faoi Thoinn]].{{Cite dragon/376/Realmslore: Sarifal}}

Description.Manifestations:
Deep Sashelas appeared to his worshipers in three different ways:
* A twinkle of light from afar that, if followed by worshipers, led them to a safe place.
* A small vent from which bubbles of air escape. He  appeared in this form in sea elf communities to warn them of a potential threat or attack.
* A dolphin-shaped vision made of water with a silver glow. He used this form when communicating with sea elf communities.

document_data.Personality:
Deep Sashelas' presence was felt all across [[Toril]] and he sought to be on good terms with underwater races beyond the [[sea elves]]. To do so, he relied on the charisma that made him a natural leader, and on his skill as mediator.

Sashelas preferred to use [[water]]-based [[magic]] and avoided [[fire]] [[spell]]s.
document_data.Activities: Despite his involvement, his avatar rarely appeared to fight directly, but he made an exception if [[Sekolah]] or [[Panzuriel]] were involved. About half the time, he was accompanied by [[Trishina]]'s avatar. On rare occasions, he would appear with another ''[[asathalfinare]]'' member's avatar.

Relationships.Seldarine: As a member of the [[Seldarine]], Deep Sashelas had good relationships with its other members. He answered directly to [[Corellon Larethian]].
Relationships.Dark Seldarine: Deep Sashelas was an enemy of the [[Dark Seldarine]], but [[Eilistraee]] counted him as her friend.
Relationships.Asathalfinare: Sashelas was the leader of the ''asathalfinare'' pantheon, and he had good relationships with its members ([[Eadro]], [[Persana]], [[Trishina]], and [[Surminare]]). His relationship was deeper with Trishina, his consort, specifically.

Worshipers.Temples: :''See [[:Category:Temples to Deep Sashelas|Temples to Deep Sashelas]]''
